1.1.name: wordpress/wd-search-form
1.1.description:
Integrate an amazing search widget to your widget's sidebar! Use the widget's built-in autocomplete capability to allow your users to search your site quickly and easily.

Feature List:

  1. Built-in Autocomplete shows results while the user types
  2. Choose your own default value string
  3. Graphically attractive, easily customizable, various styles are available
  4. Very simple to setup
  5. Works with both "ltr" and "rtl" languages and themes

If upgrading, be sure to backup your database first

Follow me on twitter to be updated on new versions and releases @YoavKadosh

Visit my website for more information about the plugin (written in hebrew) WebDesk.co.il
